creator: hps@intermeta.de
text:
The main reason for this is the hard coded (100,100) view box for SVG images.
This is a patch against the maintenance branch head which corrects the following
issues with SVG images in PDF:

- create a special SVG view box for a svg image. Update it with the size
  information from the SVG image.

- render the SVGimage in the right position inside the view box so that
  it does not get shifted out of the view box

creator: bowditch_chris@hotmail.com
text:
Thanks for the Patch. It may fix your problem but it looks to me like you have 
broken a few other things, e.g. how will messages reported by Batik bubble up 
to the FOP user? Your patch just sets a Null Logger!

In any case, it is academic since development to the maintainance branch has 
been frozen and so no patches will be applied to it.
batch transition to closed remaining pre-FOP1.0 resolved bugs
creator: gadams@apache.org
